titles: Naked truth needs no shift: or, an answer to a libellous sheet, entituled, The Quakers last shift found out
author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
notes: Dated and signed at end: The 11th of the 7th month, 1674. By William Penn.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
